Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
Manages data operations related to users, including Entrants.

      Checks if an Entrant with the given device ID already exists.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID to check.
      listener - Callback to handle the result.

    • getEntrantByDeviceId

      public void getEntrantByDeviceId(android.content.Context context, UserRepository.OnEntrantDataFetchListener listener)
      Retrieves an Entrant's data from Firebase using the device ID.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to access system services.
      listener - Callback to handle the retrieved data or errors.

    • updateEntrant

      public void updateEntrant(String userId, Entrant entrant, UserRepository.OnEntrantUpdateListener listener)
      Updates or creates an Entrant's data in Firebase.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the entrant.
      entrant - The Entrant object containing updated data.
      listener - Callback to handle success or errors.

    • uploadProfilePhoto

      public void uploadProfilePhoto(String userId, android.net.Uri fileUri, UserRepository.OnUploadCompleteListener listener)
      Uploads an Entrant's profile photo to Firebase Storage and updates the profilePhotoUrl in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the entrant.
      fileUri - The URI of the image file to upload.
      listener - Callback to handle the upload result.

    • deleteProfilePhoto

      public void deleteProfilePhoto(String userId, UserRepository.OnDeleteCompleteListener listener)
      Deletes an Entrant's profile photo from Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the entrant.
      listener - Callback to handle the deletion result.
